when.test: templateType != null and templateType == '学生评教'

choose.when: select t.* ,(case when end_date > current_date then 1 else 2 end) is_active ,(case when PJ.TEMPLATE_CODE is not null then 1 else 2 end) is_pj from JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE t LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ where user_id = #{userId}) pj on PJ.TEMPLATE_CODE = t.TEMPLATE_CODE where TEMPLATE_TYPE = '学生评教'
choose.otherwise: select t.* ,(case when end_date > current_date then 1 else 2 end) is_active from JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE t

mapper.select: select template_code from JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE where template_type = #{templateType} and end_date > current_date
mapper.insert: insert into JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE (TEMPLATE_CODE, TEMPLATE_TYPE, TEMPLATE_NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_DATE) values (#{templateCode},#{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},CURRENT_DATE)

insert all
into JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE_TARGET (TEMPLATE_CODE,TARGET_CODE) values (#{templateCode},#{targetCode})
